channel.title: Zero Hour
channel.description:
So we have decided on the name "Zero Hour", were going with a PI, loading some cache that's too high to count, I'll be posting pictures eventually, were basing it on Eco/Skill and then some PvP, the combat sucks, if we can find ways to improve it, maybe this will attract more PvP'ers idk.
Little background I made.. Not a lot, but it works for now. I'm going to change the log in boxes color to match it eventually. [IMG]http://i1109.photobucket.com/albums/h430/tyb97/Client-Screen.png[/img]
I've never seen a home in Draynor, so I'll just go ahead and setup shop there. [IMG]http://i1109.photobucket.com/albums/h430/tyb97/Home-1.png[/img]
Current staff is:
Owner(s) - Me & Jal Knight Developer(s) - OPEN
Were pretty much looking for a client developer, and a couple server developers, especially those who have played RS a lot, and have knowledge of how all the minigames/skills work, as I rarely play.
Here's the basic application: [code] Name: Java experience: What you hope to do for this development: Age: Way to contact: [/code] Feel free to add-on or take away from it, I don't care how its set up as long as its legitimate.
---- Currently adding an achievement system, and that club system I talked about in my latest post.
I would like to make a quick note about our developer dragx55, he is a remarkable programmer, don't think that with his Junior Member rank, and one year of Java experience, that he is some nub, he is one of the hardest, best workers I have ever had.

item.title: Zero Hour
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:36, topic:450538”]Here’s a little idea I had, tell me what you think.

I will implement “clubs” its a lot like clans, but not put on by a player, rather put on by the server, which can be accessed through an NPC, there will be a “Club Manager” at home, to where if you go to speak to him, he will notice you don’t have a club, and teleport you to the club zone, were there will be multiple NPC’s, that can add you to there club. When you are part of the club, you are automatically put in the clan chat that is with them. All the players will just start out with the regular rank, if one begins to stand out, the members can nominate, and if a leader is chosen, the staff can appoint him his position in the club. I may even make a “Club Leader” rank In-game, so other club leaders can take notice to each other, and plan events and such. So with the clan leaders being able to put on unofficial events, we may also be able to put on official events, which can pertain to one club, or several, just depends. Well this was just my brainstorm, let me know what you think.[/quote]
code 4ever u coders!

Read full topic

Well this was just my brainstorm, let me know what you think.[/quote]

item.title: Zero Hour
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Here’s a little idea I had, tell me what you think.

I will implement “clubs” its a lot like clans, but not put on by a player, rather put on by the server, which can be accessed through an NPC, there will be a “Club Manager” at home, to where if you go to speak to him, he will notice you don’t have a club, and teleport you to the club zone, were there will be multiple NPC’s, that can add you to there club. When you are part of the club, you are automatically put in the clan chat that is with them. All the players will just start out with the regular rank, if one begins to stand out, the members can nominate, and if a leader is chosen, the staff can appoint him his position in the club. I may even make a “Club Leader” rank In-game, so other club leaders can take notice to each other, and plan events and such. So with the clan leaders being able to put on unofficial events, we may also be able to put on official events, which can pertain to one club, or several, just depends. Well this was just my brainstorm, let me know what you think.

Read full topic
